Package hotciv.framework

This package contains the HotCiv framework roles, defined by interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActionStrategy  
AgingStrategy  
AttackStrategy  
City Represents a city in the game.
Game Game is the central interface allowing a client to access and modify the state of a HotCiv game.
GameObserver Defines the Observer role for a Game.
HotCivFactory  
Tile Tile represents a single territory tile of a given type.
Unit Represents a single unit in the game.
WinnerStrategy  
WorldLayoutStrategy  
 

Class Summary
GameConstants Collection of constants used in HotCiv Game.
Position Position on the world map.
 

Enum Summary
Player Represents a player of the game.
 

Package hotciv.framework Description

This package contains the HotCiv framework roles, defined by interfaces.
